1100100000010110 0111110101100011 0 -> sum: 0100010101111001, cout: 1
0011010000111100 0111010100101011 0 -> sum: 1010100101100111, cout: 0
1011001110111000 0100111011111110 0 -> sum: 0000001010110110, cout: 1
1001010110100001 1011010110101011 1 -> sum: 0100101101001101, cout: 1
1111111110001100 1110010000010011 0 -> sum: 1110001110011111, cout: 1
0011101010000001 0111101000100011 1 -> sum: 1011010010100101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
